alert.note: Alert for Woodson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 12:43AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Woodson County through 115 AM CDT... At 1243 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northwest of Toronto, or 14 miles east of Eureka, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yates Center, Toronto, Cross Timbers State Park, Toronto Lake and Batesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for southeastern Kansas.
